item.title: Launch of my website
item.description: Here I will post blogs of my projects soon, to provide you some background information to my git projects and personal interests. This site was created with Hugo. I use the allegiant theme. I will come back soon… Math script testing This page contains some example $$\LaTeX$$ $$\varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } }$$
